name: OKHexStringColor
summary: A simple iOS category on UIColor with a method that returns a color from a hexadecimal string.
description:
# OKHexStringColor
A simple iOS category on UIColor with a method that returns a color from a hexadecimal string
##Examples
You can either use the long method

'''objc
UIColor *darkColorWithAlpha = [UIColor colorWithHexString:@"525252" andAlpha:0.9f];
'''

Or the handy macro

'''objc
UIColor *greenColor = HexColor(@"00d756");
'''
